title: Is alternative its own genre of music, or is it just a subset of rock? - Quora

response.answer_text: Is alternative its own genre of music, or is it just a subset of rock? And.. there’s a penalty flag on the field. The ref is signalling “False dichotomy on the field. 5 yard penalty, repeat the down”. False dichotomy - phrasing something as “either/or”, when it’s possible there’s a third (or more) realistic answer, or it’s possible to be A *and* B. So consider this question for a while, and then reflect on your own: Is rock its own genre, or just a subset of music?

Alternative was anti-metal & anti-rock - thus Kurt Cobain was called an Anti-hero - he turned music upside-down Nirvana killed off the hair bands & thrash bands practically overnight !!! i saw it change in NYC !!! Wow
